title: Pixel 5 on Verizon: Get Verizon or Unlocked?
content:
Currently on Verizon, but want to change to a newer model phone on Verizon -- so, Pixel 5.
Key reason: I want Android updates ASAP.
OTHER than being locked to Verizon vs. being unlocked: What are the differences between the leftmost (Verizon) and rightmost (Unlocked) options on this page?
https://store.google.com/us/config/pixel_5
e.g.
What would the Unlocked model not do on verizon's network that the Verizon model would do?
Would the Verizon choice get OTA updates just as fast as the Unlocked choice, or is VZW still a slow middleman?
